channel.title: Keycloak on AOE OpenSource
channel.description: Recent content in Keycloak on AOE OpenSource

item.title: The Key to Keycloak
item.description: Keycloak is our go-to tool when it comes to identity management, federating identities over multiple sources and organizing and managing roles for all kinds of applications. Naturally, there is no “one-tool-fits-all”, so Keycloak too sometimes needs to be customized beyond what the configuration offers, and we need to implement providers to add additional configuration.
